article_title: South Africa seeks halt to Israel's Gaza offensive
sentence: Israel  began  its  offensive  in  Gaza  after  gunmen  from  the  ruling  Palestinian  group  Hamas  launched  an  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  252  others  hostage.

article_title: South Africa seeks halt to Israel's Gaza offensive
sentence: More  than  35,270  people  have  been  killed  by  Israel  in  the  war  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
